title: 일러스트레이터로 Waste It On Me(feat.BTS) 뮤비 만들기

json.text: This is illustration tutorial of ‘Steve Aoki-Waste it on me(feat.BTS)’ lyric video.
In this tutorial, Try illustration graphic and make motion next video.
You can find final illustration file Download link below.
Open illustrator and choose HDTVD1080 preset.
There’s green guide lines. These are not visible on final export.
We’ll make 3 images from MV’s about 10s. Add 2 more Artboard.
Import 3 images already captured.
Now, Add layer to separate background and images.
This is for process convenience.
Make Rectaglar and Select Gradient.
Type is freeform gradient, the third one.
Draw option is point.
Click the Dots and change colors.
Use spuit tool for select the color.
Dotted line around the color dot is color area. You can expand color area.
White Dots are handle. Click and Move it. Then color area modified.
Change colors to all Artboard Rectagle.
Make Oval and  Select Gradient. Change gradient angle(-90) and color.
You can change colors by click the fill box.
I'm going to use spuit again.
You can modify colors and positions by Gradient Bar.
Adding, Managing Colors.
Click the dots from gradient panel. There's color swatches.
Add layer ‘Graphic’. For convenience.
Now, Copy & Paste Ovals.
And adjust gradient color position. To make little bit difference to ovals.
Then make rectangular. Select Gradient, Copy & Paste again.
The difference between rectangular and rounded rectangular is
You can’t make smaller rounded rectangular than corner radius.
So, Make radius after fix the size.
Making radius using oval handle on angular points.
Now, the most important part. Typography. Make Space between letters to 200.
I Think the font is Futura + Helvetica Neue.
Medium is font weight
Futra has angular form. And Helvetica is the most ordinary font for designer.
Use Helvetica If you don’t know what to use.
Neue means New in German.
Simply, It's Helvetica New Edition.
A looks upside down version of Futura V. N M is Helvetica Neue.
Select Type, Choose Create Outline. Text layer become editable.
Use pathfinder boolean to edit typo.
It’s time to make gradient oval.
As I did few min before, Use freeform gradient.
Mix draw option point & line to looks more like beads.
After make all beads
Distribute and align ovals.
Finally, Copy & Paste lines to looks more like captures.
File -> Export for Screens to make JPG or PNG files.
Default setting is PNG. Trasperent available.
If you prefer less file volum, Choose JPG.
Check out the final image. Voila.
